experience.title: experience
experience.description:
3+ years in software development and 2+ years of commercial experience. I build responsive, accessible, and performant web apps and seek a full‑time role to contribute and grow.

· Frontend Web Developer — NDA
Feb 2024 – Mar 2025 · Ukraine
- Landing pages with HTML, CSS, JavaScript; interactive elements, animations, and sliders (custom and library‑based).
- Adaptive/responsive layouts; cross‑browser compatibility; code quality and performance optimization.

· Freelance Web Developer
Feb 2023 – Feb 2024 · Ukraine
- Creating landing pages and small web apps.
- MERN stack development (React/Node.js/MongoDB).
- WordPress e‑commerce setup and hosting.
- Telegram bots and automation.

· Engineer — Ukrainian Railways
Aug 2009 – Feb 2024 · Ukraine
- Installed, configured, and maintained digital communication systems and fiber‑optic lines.
- High‑/low‑frequency measurement workflows and systems maintenance.

· Company Owner — L&V Company
Oct 2009 – Feb 2015 · Ukraine
- Retail operations management; sales and installation of metal‑plastic structures.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
· Core stack:
HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux, Node.js, MongoDB, SQL, Git, REST API, AWS, Linux, Docker, Jenkins.

· Front‑end:
Responsive/adaptive layouts, accessibility basics, cross‑browser compatibility, animations and sliders (custom and library‑based), performance profiling and optimization.

· Back‑end:
Node.js/Express, RESTful APIs, MongoDB (Mongoose), basic SQL.

· Tooling & DevOps:
Git and CI/CD, Docker, basics of AWS, Linux CLI, WordPress deployments, hosting/monitoring.

· Other:
MERN applications, Telegram bot integrations, e‑commerce setups on WordPress.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
Responsible, quick‑learning, goal‑oriented.

Clear communication, teamwork, and ownership mindset.

Strong problem‑solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to deliver under deadlines.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me

I’m a front‑end developer with a full‑stack mindset, 3+ years in software development and 2+ years of commercial work. I care about clean, maintainable UIs and measurable UX/performance gains, and I’m looking for a full‑time role to make an impact.

My engineering background at Ukrainian Railways strengthened discipline, system thinking, and reliability in production environments.

interests.title: interests
interests.description:
· Continuous learning;
· Modern front‑end architectures;
· UI animations and micro‑interactions;
· Performance tuning;
· Automation and scripting;
· DevOps basics (Docker/AWS);
· MERN side projects;
· Telegram bots;
· Artificial Intelligence.

sports.title: sports
sports.description: Outside of coding, I enjoy staying active and keeping a healthy lifestyle. I like working out both at outdoor sports grounds and in the gym, where I can challenge myself and build discipline. Cycling is another passion of mine, as it allows me to combine physical activity with exploring new places. I also enjoy taking walks, which helps me recharge and find inspiration for my projects.

music.title: music
music.description: Music has always been an important part of my life. I enjoy playing both the guitar and the piano, which allows me to express creativity in different ways. I also love listening to beautiful and interesting music, as it inspires me, helps me relax, and often sparks new ideas for my work.
